issue.title: [Packaging] Remove artifact form ubuntu-trusty build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2915](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2915). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
apache-arrow_{version}-1.debian.tar.xz

`[~kou]` please confirm, but ubuntu trusty doesn't build such an archive

comments.body:
